tripleplay.particle.Effector

    Package Description
    tripleplay.particle  
    tripleplay.particle.effect  

    • Uses of Effector in tripleplay.particle

      Fields in tripleplay.particle with type parameters of type Effector 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      List<Effector> Emitter.effectors
      The effectors used by this emitter.
      Method parameters in tripleplay.particle with type arguments of type Effector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int ParticleBuffer.apply(List<? extends Effector> effectors, float now, float dt)
      Applies the supplied effectors to all (live) particles in this buffer.

    • Uses of Effector in tripleplay.particle.effect

      Subclasses of Effector in tripleplay.particle.effect 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Drag
      Applies friction (drag) to particles.
      class  Gravity
      Applies uniform gravity to particles.
      class  Move
      Moves particles based on their velocity.
      Methods in tripleplay.particle.effect that return Effector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Effector Alpha.byAge(Interpolator interp)
      Returns an effector that updates the particle's alpha based on its age, as adjusted by the supplied interpolator.
      static Effector Alpha.byAge(Interpolator interp, float startAlpha, float endAlpha)
      Returns an effector that updates the particle's alpha based on its age, as adjusted by the supplied interpolator.
